name: Aleam Ludere - Play at Dice
description:
Controls:

  • WSAD - Movement
  • Space - Roll Dice
  • Mouse1 - Shoot
  • Aim with Mouse

Play as a dice wielding cowboy who got caught cheating using loading dice. To take your turn, press space to roll a dice. The AP you get will allow you to either move or shoot. If you get caught three times, it’s game over.

My take on the theme is a turn-based, top-down western shooter.

Bfxr – Sound Effects

Font – Silkscreen

Music: Lasso Lady by congusbongus (https://opengameart.org/content/lasso-lady-seamless-loop)
